commit message: Added viewpager for deepzoom so users can swipe between images.
Updated viewpager to load selected item first.
Fixed crash on rotation bug in deepzoom
Updated application to avoid grabbing thread.json multiple times.

Moved media to util. Also resolving issues 3, 11 and 15 because I fixed them earlier and forgot to close them.

Fixes #3
Fixes #11
Fixes #15
Fixed deepzoom item select
fixed double onoptionsitemselected bug
Changed back affordence to call back button instead of finish
Added open in external browser
Downloads to custom Ouroboros directory.
Forgot break in switch case.
Added share button to menu
#1 Added initial framework for multi-image support for deepzoom and gallery
#1 Moved image properties to media objects. Media objects are now serialized and then placed in the database for all images not just extras. Began work on viewpager for threadview.
migrated application to fragment support library.
Gave up trying to use viewpagers. Decided to try and use recyclerviews instead. Boosted cache size to 150MB
Bit of code cleanup and made mediaviewadapter act like a viewpager for scrolling.
Added Palette for images
Fixed the preferencefragment overlay issue. Need to address later because of mixed support fragments and regular fragments.
Multiple image uploading
Added alternative layout for thread view
Readded embed code
Added Swatch to webms
Play button on deepzoom webms
Fixed a crash with spoiled images and made thread adapter a bit more robust
Updated support library
Added up ui affordence to deepzoom
Cleaning up the database and bumping version number
Fixed youtube swatch on horizontal view
Updated save all images to use media items
Viewpager caused next image to be set as title instead of current image
Added ability for users to select number of columns displayed in catalog view
Spelling
Improved feedback on network failures
Bump for release

Merge pull request #25 from Luorrak/development

Release 0.5
